snippet.title: Dwarf Shop Trailer
snippet.description:
Dwarf Shop is a Shop Simulator with, you guessed it, Dwarves! Help the Dragon Clan lure their very own dragon by amassing piles and piles of glorious gold. Send one dwarf deep into the caves to find ingredients while the others craft various equipment and sell them to unsuspecting customers! It is created by Potion Junkies, a very small game development team.

Find it on STEAM https://store.steampowered.com/app/1247640/Dwarf_Shop/
